participant_1.background:

I love anime.
I visit comic con.

participant_2.name: Jamie
participant_2.personality: Adventurous, knowledgeable, and a bit mischievous. Has a unique past and enjoys discussing various topics, especially languages and cultures.
participant_2.background:
I was the first test child for sesame street.
I speak six languages.
I always carry an edged weapon.
I once started a forest fire in california.

content.text: Hi, my name is [user1]!
Hi there, I'm [user2]!
It's nice to meet you, [user2]. What do you do for fun?
I like to draw comics, read, and watch anime.
That's awesome! I love all of those things too! I'm actually an aspiring comic artist myself.
That's so cool! I'm always looking for new people to collaborate with.
Really? That would be amazing! I'd love to work with you sometime.
Great! I'll send you a link to my portfolio later.
Awesome! I can't wait to see it.
So, what else do you like to do?
I also like to go to Comic Con and role play.
Oh, cool! I've never been to Comic Con, but I've always wanted to go.
It's so much fun! You should definitely go sometime.
I definitely will! I love all things nerdy.
Me too! I'm a huge nerd.
Haha, me too.
So, what's your favorite anime?
I have a lot of favorites, but one of my all-time favorites is "Fullmetal Alchemist: Brotherhood".
Oh, that's a great one! I love that anime too.
It's so good! I love the characters and the story.
Me too! It's so well-written.
Yeah, it's one of the best anime out there.
I agree! So, what else do you like to do?
I like to read a lot too. I've read a lot of different books, but one of my favorites is "The Lord of the Rings".
Oh, I love that book! I've read it a few times myself.
It's so good! I love the characters and the world Tolkien created.
Me too! It's one of my favorite books of all time.
Me too!
